column3: Opening: August 4, 19h PROJECT GENDER [COLLECTION_INTRO] Collective Exposic贸n Artists: Gerard Rancinan Hei Yue - Ji Sheng Li Hilton Brothers Peter Klansen Ramon Guimaraes Thierry Bisch Wayne Schoenfeld A group exhibition that seeks to penetrate those identities (temporary or permanent) fleeing social, medical, religious or anthropological stereotypes. The exhibition presents a selection of the most representative works of the five phases of "PROJECT GENDER", which started in 2006 and 2017 will be presented in full at the institutional level. Curated by Franco De Toledo. Produced by Circuit Festival 2016 Performance "Being Available" by Ram贸n Guimaraes (20:30 h.), Dj set Josephine Basinger (Sevilla). Special thanks to Moritz. + Info
